name: reproducibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be shown, done, or made again: This equipment will reliably, reproducibly, and accurately detect the presence of metal in luggage or on a person. We can't draw any conclusions until the effect can be created reproducibly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe design was finalized once it could be shown to deliver reproducibly reliable results.The camera set-up for the photo shoot needs to be reproducibly accurate.Mechanization allowed these items to be produced reproducibly to a high standard.
